security: The dispatch discusses the debriefing of an individual who was granted asylum, revealing details about his cooperation, personality, and claims about his past activities and associations. Disclosing that “CEELLANA claims that he had no relationship of the Cuban C-2, that he knew Ramiro VAllo FINCIPO, Deputy Chief of the 0-2, but that he rew any business with thea,” could compromise intelligence-gathering methods or sources and potentially endanger individuals mentioned.
summary: A CIA dispatch details the debriefing of an individual (subject CEELLANA) who defected from Cuba, assessing his credibility, relationships with Cuban intelligence figures, and past activities.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret dispatch outlines the debriefing of a Cuban defector, CEELLANA, after he was removed from CAC to a safe site, focusing on determining his connections to Cuban intelligence, including the C-2. The debriefing revealed CEELLANA as an opportunist and sharp operator, who claims no direct relationship with Cuban intelligence but acknowledges knowing Ramiro VAllo FINCIPO. He was granted asylum in the Uruguayan Embassy with the help of RODRIGUES and had previously been involved in transporting materials and personnel in Cuba. The dispatch also mentions that he admitted to certain criminal activities, connections to anti-communist groups, and his eventual return to the US.
title: Debriefing of Cuban Defector
